price: 20. Those who fulfil the Covenant of Allâh and break not the Mîthâq (bond, treaty, covenant).
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يُوفُونَ بِعَهۡدِ ٱللَّهِ وَلَا يَنقُضُونَ ٱلۡمِيثَٰقَ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: alladhīna yūfūna biʿahdi al-lahi walā yanquḍūna al-mīthāqa
